BuildOnAllTerrainFeatures.Name: Build on all terrain features
BuildOnAllTerrainFeatures.Description:
Check this box to place buildings on crops, trees, and similar objects.

WARNING: Buildings will immediately delete those objects when placed over them!
BuildOnOtherBuildings.Name: Build on other buildings
BuildOnOtherBuildings.Description: Check this box to place buildings on tiles that already contain other buildings.
BuildOnWater.Name: Build on water
BuildOnWater.Description: Check this box to place buildings on water tiles.
BuildOnImpassableTiles.Name: Build on impassable tiles
BuildOnImpassableTiles.Description: Check this box to place buildings on impassable tiles, e.g. cliffs and other obstructions.
BuildOnNoFurnitureTiles.Name: Build on "no furniture" tiles
BuildOnNoFurnitureTiles.Description: Check this box to place buildings on tiles with the "NoFurniture" property.
BuildOnCaveAndShippingZones.Name: Build on cave and shipping zones
BuildOnCaveAndShippingZones.Description: Check this box to place buildings on tiles in the preset cave entrance and shipping bin areas.
